parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: My name is Andrea Chinguel Labán.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: It was at the time of one of Fujimori’s campaigns

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: One reason for it was that I already had my daughters

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and I went to check their weight

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and there the nurses told us

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: they took us to the hospital

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and we didn’t know that it would affect us like this.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and now we can’t work anymore.
